data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Vinnytsya, Ukraine a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Vinnytsya, Ukraine
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Vinnytsya, Ukraine to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 1,629,813 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.section_summary: On average, 187 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Vinnytsya, Ukraine.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Vinnytsya.
Jesus, strengthen the church in Vinnytsya, Ukraine by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Kyrgyz people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Kyrgyz people.
Spirit, help the people of the the state of Vinnytsya to be consumed with longing for your Word at all times, like David.
data.verse: My soul is consumed with longing for your laws at all times.

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Vinnytsya, Ukraine to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Father, set on fire the hearts and passion of your church in the state of Vinnytsya.
data.verse: Do not be slothful in zeal, be fervent in spirit, serve the Lord.

location.name: Vinnytsya
location.people_groups_list: Thai, Orok, Azerbaijani, Tatar, Judeo-Crimean, Jew, Karaite
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Thai (3,800), Orok (900), Azerbaijani (41,000), Tatar, Judeo-Crimean (1,700), Jew, Karaite (1,200)
